data.text: And that is, rich people buy time, poor people sell time.

data.text: or employees they sell their time.

data.text: that you can not replace.

translation.text: mà bạn không thể thay thế.

data.text: you know cleaning your home

data.text: or doing all the stuff, mowing your lawn.

data.text: You know, a quick story,

translation.text: Bạn biết đấy, một câu chuyện nhanh chóng,

data.text: Right?
